examples.title: Example 1
examples.code:
import * as React from "react" import { Card, CardContent } from "@/components/ui/card" import { Carousel, CarouselContent, CarouselItem, CarouselNext, CarouselPrevious, } from "@/components/ui/carousel" export function CarouselDemo() { return ( {Array.from({ length: 5 }).map((_, index) => (
{index + 1}
))} ) }

examples.title: Sizes
examples.code:
import {
  Carousel,
  CarouselContent,
  CarouselItem,
  CarouselNext,
  CarouselPrevious,
} from "@/components/ui/carousel"

examples.title: Example 5
Sizes
examples.code:
// 33% of the carousel width.
<Carousel>
  <CarouselContent>
    <CarouselItem className="basis-1/3">...</CarouselItem>
    <CarouselItem className="basis-1/3">...</CarouselItem>
    <CarouselItem className="basis-1/3">...</CarouselItem>
  </CarouselContent>
</Carousel>

examples.title: Sizes
examples.code:
// 50% on small screens and 33% on larger screens.
<Carousel>
  <CarouselContent>
    <CarouselItem className="md:basis-1/2 lg:basis-1/3">...</CarouselItem>
    <CarouselItem className="md:basis-1/2 lg:basis-1/3">...</CarouselItem>
    <CarouselItem className="md:basis-1/2 lg:basis-1/3">...</CarouselItem>
  </CarouselContent>
</Carousel>

examples.title: Example 8
examples.code:
import * as React from "react" import { Card, CardContent } from "@/components/ui/card" import { Carousel, CarouselContent, CarouselItem, CarouselNext, CarouselPrevious, } from "@/components/ui/carousel" export function CarouselSpacing() { return ( {Array.from({ length: 5 }).map((_, index) => (
{index + 1}
))} ) }

examples.title: Sizes
examples.code:
<Carousel>
  <CarouselContent className="-ml-2 md:-ml-4">
    <CarouselItem className="pl-2 md:pl-4">...</CarouselItem>
    <CarouselItem className="pl-2 md:pl-4">...</CarouselItem>
    <CarouselItem className="pl-2 md:pl-4">...</CarouselItem>
  </CarouselContent>
</Carousel>
